attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reverse the decision to remove the 10% tax band for income tax. This decision has added £200 to my tax bill and many thousands who are on low income. To increase the tax burden on this group makes a mockery of the Labour Party caring for the low paid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
